segments.text: Doctor , here's my report for my IVP examination .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me have a look . Can you see there's a stone in your kidney ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to have an operation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's not necessary since the stone is not big .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , I can still attend the Olympic Games .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you're lucky . But you should go to the Ultrasonic Department to disperse the stone . Meanwhile , I'll give you some herbal medicine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I've heard a lot about the Chinese herbal medicine . I believe it will work .
segments.speaker: S1
